name: Robin Colcord: A Tribute to Roger Rees Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Rich.

	Robin was one of the richest men in the country. That is what attracted him to Rebecca.

England.

	In one episode, Rebecca told Sam she knew she was bad in bed. She then said, "Robin just doesn't know any better because he's English."

questions.text: What was the name of Robin's boat?
questions.explanation:
The Rebecca.

	People wanted to kill Robin in this episode because he was so rich. In this same episode, Sam sailed Robin's boat with Norm and Carla. They had just made it out of the boat when the bomb on it went off, blowing up the boat.

questions.text: What was the restaurant Robin and Rebecca went to before the first time they had sex?
questions.explanation:
Little Wally's Pub N Burger.

	Rebecca said it was "a low down, dirty place". She later went with some of the gang from Cheers. While there, Sam caught Robin with another woman.

questions.text: What was the name of Robin's other girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Jeanne-Marie.

	Jean-Marie was French. She was always in the limelight. She even appeared on "The Aresenio Hall Show" much to Rebecca's dismay.

Insider trading.

	He figured out Rebecca's password to the company computer. He used it to steal money from the company.

questions.text: What was Rebecca's nickname for Robin?
questions.explanation:
Sweet Baby.

	That also happened to be her password to the company computer. Robin didn't have a nickname for her.

questions.text: Who sang at Robin and Rebecca's wedding?
questions.explanation:
Bobby Hatfield.

	They never actually got married. Rebecca realized she only loved him for his money.

questions.text: How much money did Robin have in a money belt hidden underneath Rebecca's desk?
questions.explanation:
$6 million dollars.

	He tried to get back with Rebecca by asking what if he was still rich. She thought he was bluffing and said no.

questions.text: In season 11, Robin came back and was poor. Why did he choose to give up his money?
options: Money is what put him in prison.
questions.explanation:
Money destroys people.

	The gang thought he had another money belt hidden at the bar.  They destroyed the bar looking for it, only to find out it didn't exist.
